name: Colorbox Panels & Info Box
author: wpshopmart

sections.description:
Colorbox panels is based on bootstrap framework, so box is responsive and friendly to any mobile devices. Colorbox is integrated with masonry/isotope effect. You can add multiple content box and icon box on multiple pages and post. There unlimited colour scheme and font style available for content.

This is not a popup box or lightbox plugin, this is a content box or icon box plugin, which is display your content in column layout. You can add service page or, team page using colorbox plugin. There Widget option also available, just paste your shortcode [WPSM_COLORBOX id=xx] in text widget for display your content in widget area.

Features Of Plugin

  • Responsive Design
  • Colorbox is responsive and friendly to any mobile devices
  • Limitless Colorbox/panels anywhere in the theme
  • Drag and Drop builder Api integrated.
  • Draggable box items for easy sorting
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for box content
  • Unlimited colour option
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Less for quick customization
  • Font Awesome Icon Support
  • Font Awesome Icon Picker Integrated
  • Two different styles Integrated
  • Hide All Colorbox on page load or display all
  • Five box layout available
  • Masonry/Isotope effect integrated
  • Box Same height js integrated
  • Gulp for instant workflow
  • Display iconbox
  • Display only description
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Frontend and backend UI
  • Add and remove box item from backend.
  • Multiple Advanced Custom Field Available
  • All browser compatible

Colorbox Pro Features

  • Responsive Design
  • Colorbox is responsive and friendly to any mobile devices
  • Limitless Colorbox/panels anywhere in the theme
  • Drag and Drop builder Api integrated.
  • 8 Types Of Loading Animation
  • External Link Option
  • Individual Box Color Settings
  • 10 types of Box Layout
  • 500+ Google Fonts Integrated
  • Box Border Customization
  • Box Shadow Generator
  • Box Radius Customization
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for box content
  • Unlimited colour option
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Less for quick customization
  • Font Awesome Icon Support
  • Font Awesome Icon Picker Integrated
  • Two different styles Integrated
  • Hide All Colorbox on page load or display all
  • Five box layout available
  • Masonry/Isotope effect integrated
  • Box Same height js integrated
  • Gulp for instant workflow
  • Display iconbox
  • Display only description
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Frontend and backend UI
  • Add and remove box item from backend.
  • Multiple Advanced Custom Field Available
  • All browser compatible

Check Demos

  • Colorbox Pro – Live Demo
  • Upgrade To Colorbox Pro

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire colobox-panels folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Colorbox Panels menu to customize this plugin.
  4. Copy your publish Colorbox shortcode and then paste into your page or post to display it.
sections.faq: Please use WordPress support forum to ask any query regarding any issue.

sections.reviews:
Very good!

By makehop on January 6, 2023

Very good!

OK

By nspra on June 28, 2022

oki

Great job!

By John (dsl225) on March 31, 2021

This plugin is awesome, especially for its very affordable pro version that allows implementing versatile box everywhere and particularly for users allergic to Gutenberg blocks because you may design whatever you need just with Classic Editor.

annoying wp-admin messages

By webgalway on January 28, 2021

Keep getting annoying Christmas ad offer showing in wp-admin for wpshopmart - so have to delete plugin itself to be rid of them - fair enough if you want to advertise on your own plugin settings page but every page in wp-admin is too much

Didn't meet my Expectations

By Tom (somethis) on May 8, 2019

Maybe it's just me, but the limitations on the free version are very harsh. The only gratis feature is to display the box title (or hide it). It just didn't come close to my expectations when looking at the overview Features vs Pro Features. Bye the way, I was looking for a simple tool. Nothing fancy, so I thought this was it.

Limits are quickly reached and no support

By Trebly on February 17, 2019

As I tell in the title the limits of the product are quickly reached. What are these limits, I just give some examples:
  • No user color palette : if you want to define your colors you must memorize your colors and paste hexa value for each box.
  • Default value of user colors have same value for chars and background if you don't change the chars value you get no display... It misses just set default chars color to black !!! You tell it to support and two month after there is no no answer, what you tell is always forgotten by support.after one or two days
  • If you have developed for your pages a js routine to calculate elements position when the window is resized the two events "resize" (one into your code and the one of the colorbox which adapts the display to the width). I margin left or right changed and the display is not redefined (missing on('...') launch position calculation. So colorbox cannot be managed if you have a js manager which can change some elements of the display and affect usable width : no compatibility.
  • To know : any box has H3 header and the content his the H3 content, but you cannot define complementary attributes. Consequently you are unable to associate classes or "data-" attributes with the elementary boxes. I explain if you can add classes or "data-" attributes you can use jquery to hold particular actions defined by a script (for example zoom the box into a FancyBox) or display any information, hide temporarily elementary boxes which have a define class etc.
  • The icons for elementary boxes headers are very limited, you cannot add others libraries of icons
  • etc.
Support doesn't answer at all. ... when questions are not basic. I have written seven messages I have got just once a few words of answer which were with really no relation with the question. This while I had bought the full unlimited license.

Good

By knsato on October 7, 2018

Very Good! color box is so cool!

An elegant touch, with one minuscule issue

By briannpowers on July 31, 2018

I very much enjoy using this plugin. It has added delightful variety to my articles. The only issue I have is that the bottom of the boxes seems to clip out and not load properly. Usually reloading the page fixes the problem, but readers aren't going to do that. So that's disappointing. It has been going on for essentially for as long as I've had the plugin. Solve that and it's perfect.

Great plugin!

By ogagliardijr on December 29, 2017

I purchased the Pro version. I really like this plugin and its versatility. One feature I will like to request is the ability to duplicate colorboxes. This is especially useful if for example, I need to base a new colorbox on an existing one or if I need to create an equivalent colorbox in another language. Thank you!

Výborný plugin

By jakbre on December 21, 2017

Responzivní plugin, který umí zcela jednoduchým způsobem vytvořit na vaší stránce více samostatných zobrazovacích ploch. Doporučuji.
